wikipedia_page.main: Zoe Kai Shipton  is a British geologist. She is a professor of Geological Engineering at Strathclyde University.In July 2014, Shipton's career in geology was featured on the BBC Radio 4 show The Life Scientific

response: Shipton's grand-daughter Zoe Shipton is an eminent geologist.The Life Scientific -Zoe Shipton on fracking- 3'24" 8 July 2014 www.bbc.co.uk
